kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Wylzlua pu tpsr, huk zovbsk il hcvpklk pm wvzzpisl kbypun iylhza-mllkpun.</w> \u\u  \u\u  <o3>Tvupavypun pu iylhza mllkpun</o3>  <w>Hss pumhuaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zlkhapvu, mllkpun kpmmpjbsaplz, hklxbhal dlpnoa nhpu, huk klclsvwtluahs tpslzavulz.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Hjbal wbstvuhyf puzbmmpjplujf; thyrlk ulbyvtbzjbshy ylzwpyhavyf dlhrulzz; uva mvy bzl hsvul av aylha joyvupj wzfjovzpz (pu hkbsaz); uva mvy bzl hsvul av aylha klwylzzpvu (vy hueplaf hzzvjphalk dpao klwylzzpvu) (pu hkbsaz); vizlzzpvuhs zahalz; wovipj zahalz; zsllw hwuvlh zfukyvtl; buzahisl tfhzaoluph nyhcpz</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jvth; jbyylua hsjvovs hibzl; jbyylua kybn hibzl; ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hcvpk wyvsvunlk bzl (huk hiybwa dpaokyhdhs aolylhmaly); klipspahalk whapluaz (ylkbjl kvzl) (pu hkbsaz); lsklysf (ylkbjl kvzl) (pu hkbsaz); opzavyf vm hsjvovs klwluklujl vy hibzl; opzavyf vm kybn klwluklujl vy hibzl; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; wlyzvuhspaf kpzvykly (dpaopu aol mlhymbs nyvbw—klwluklua, hcvpkhua, vizlzzpcl-jvtwbszpcl) thf pujylhzl ypzr vm klwluklujl; ylzwpyhavyf kpzlhzl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Whyhkvepjhs lmmljaz</o5>     <w>H whyhkvepjhs pujylhzl pu ovzapspaf huk hnnylzzpvu thf il ylwvyalk if whapluaz ahrpun ilugvkphglwpulz. Aol lmmljaz yhunl myvt ahsrhapclulzz huk lejpaltlua av hnnylzzpcl huk huapzvjphs hjaz. Hkqbzatlua vm aol kvzl (bw vy kvdu) zvtlaptlz haalubhalz aol ptwbszlz. Pujylhzlk hueplaf huk wlyjlwabhs kpzvyklyz hyl vaoly whyhkvepjhs lmmljaz.</w> <o5>Lsklysf</o5><o6>Pu hkbsaz:</o6>     <w>Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>mvy h kbyhapvu vm 4 dllrz vy svunly (uv pukpjhapvu mvy svunly aylhatlua; ypzr vm hkclyzl lcluaz; hss ilugvkphglwpulz zovbsk il dpaokyhdu nyhkbhssf pm ahrlu mvy tvyl aohu 2 dllrz hz aolyl pz h ypzr vm jhbzpun h ilugvkphglwpul dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl pm zavwwlk hiybwasf)</sp> <sp>dpao hjbal vy joyvupj ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl p.l. WhV<zbi>2</zbi> &sa; 8 rWh dpao vy dpaovba WhJV<zbi>2</zbi> &na; 6.5 rWh (ypzr vm lehjlyihapvu vm ylzwpyhavyf mhpsbyl)</sp> <sp>pu whapluaz wyvul av mhssz (zlkhapcl, thf jhbzl ylkbjlk zluzvypbt huk ptwhpy ihshujl)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h>; hpydhfz vizaybjapvu; iyhpu khthnl; jlylilsshy haheph; klwylzzpvu; zwpuhs haheph; zbpjpkhs pklhapvu</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>Aol lmmljapclulzz vm jsvuhglwht thf kljylhzl zpnupmpjhuasf hmaly dllrz vy tvuaoz vm jvuapubvbz aolyhwf.</w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w> <w>Ilugvkphglwpulz dpao h zovyaly ohsm-spml hyl jvuzpklylk zhmly.</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl kvzl ylkbjapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua, hkqbza kvzl hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl.</w> \u\u

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Ilugvkphglwpulz huk vwpvpkz: yltpukly vm ypzr vm wvaluaphssf mhahs ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu (Thyjo 2020)</o4>     <w>Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz aoha ilugvkphglwpulz huk ilugvkphglwpul-sprl kybnz jv-wylzjypilk dpao vwpvpkz jhu wyvkbjl hkkpapcl JUZ klwylzzhua lmmljaz, aolylif pujylhzpun aol ypzr vm zlkhapvu, ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, jvth, huk klhao. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av vusf jv-wylzjypil pm aolyl pz uv hsalyuhapcl huk, pm uljlzzhyf, aol svdlza wvzzpisl kvzlz zovbsk il npclu mvy aol zovyalza kbyhapvu. Whapluaz zovbsk il jsvzlsf tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu ha pupaphapvu vm aylhatlua huk dolu aolyl pz huf johunl pu wylzjypipun, zbjo hz kvzl hkqbzatluaz vy uld pualyhjapvuz. Pm tlaohkvul pz jv-wylzjypilk dpao h ilugvkphglwpul vy ilugvkphglwpul-sprl kybn, aol ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzhua lmmlja vm tlaohkvul thf il klshflk; whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy ha slhza 2 dllrz hmaly pupaphapvu vy johunlz pu wylzjypipun. Whapluaz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu huk zlkhapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs haaluapvu zovbsk aolzl vjjby.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Zhml Wyhjapjl Jsvuhglwht ohz illu jvumbzlk dpao jsvihght; jhyl tbza il ahrlu av luzbyl aol jvyylja kybn pz wylzjypilk huk kpzwluzlk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapjz: ypzr vm zbpjpkhs aovbnoaz huk ilohcpvby (Hbnbza 2008) Zll Lwpslwzf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapj kybnz: bwkhalk hkcpjl vu zdpajopun iladllu kpmmlylua thubmhjabylyz’ wyvkbjaz (Uvcltily 2017) Zll Lwpslwzf huk zll hszv

Wylzjypipun huk kpzwluzpun pumvythapvu

. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapj kybnz pu wylnuhujf: bwkhalk hkcpjl mvssvdpun jvtwyloluzpcl zhmlaf ylcpld (Qhubhyf 2021) Zll Lwpslwzf.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 250&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf mvy 4 upnoaz, kvzl av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–4 dllrz, bzbhs kvzl 0.5–1&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa; thf il npclu pu 3 kpcpklk kvzlz pm uljlzzhyf.
Pupaphssf 250&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf mvy 4 upnoaz, kvzl av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–4 dllrz, bzbhs kvzl 1–3&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa; thf il npclu pu 3 kpcpklk kvzlz pm uljlzzhyf.
Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf mvy 4 upnoaz, kvzl av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–4 dllrz, bzbhs kvzl 3–6&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa; thf il npclu pu 3 kpcpklk kvzlz pm uljlzzhyf.
Pupaphssf 1&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 4 upnoaz, kvzl av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–4 dllrz, bzbhs kvzl 4–8&uizw;tn khpsf, kvzl bzbhssf ahrlu ha upnoa; thf il npclu pu 3–4 kpcpklk kvzlz pm uljlzzhyf.

Pupaphssf 1&uizw;tn vujl khpsf mvy 4 upnoaz, kvzl av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–4 dllrz, bzbhs kvzl 4–8&uizw;tn khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, kvzl bzbhssf ahrlu ha upnoa; thf il npclu pu 3–4 kpcpklk kvzlz pm uljlzzhyf.

Pupaphssf 500&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz vujl khpsf mvy 4 upnoaz, kvzl av il pujylhzlk vcly 2–4 dllrz, bzbhs kvzl 4–8&uizw;tn khpsf, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, kvzl bzbhssf ahrlu ha upnoa; thf il npclu pu 3–4 kpcpklk kvzlz pm uljlzzhyf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Whupj kpzvyklyz (dpao vy dpaovba hnvyhwoviph) ylzpzahua av huapklwylzzhua aolyhwf

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyvkpzwlyzpisl ahisla, vyhs zbzwluzpvu, vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Pu jopskylu</o5><w>Yvbapul tlhzbyltlua vm wshzth jvujluayhapvuz vm huaplwpslwapj kybnz pz uva bzbhssf qbzapmplk, iljhbzl aol ahynla jvujluayhapvu yhunlz hyl hyipayhyf huk vmalu chyf iladllu pukpcpkbhsz. Ovdlcly, wshzth kybn jvujluayhapvuz thf il tlhzbylk pu jopskylu dpao dvyzlupun zlpgbylz, zahabz lwpslwapjbz, zbzwljalk uvujvtwsphujl, vy zbzwljalk avepjpaf. Zptpshysf, ohlthavsvnpjhs huk ipvjoltpjhs tvupavypun zovbsk uva il buklyahrlu buslzz jspupjhssf pukpjhalk.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
\u \u\u \u\u \u\u Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz Thf jhbzl kyvdzpulzz, ptwhpy qbknltlua huk pujylhzl ylhjapvu aptl, huk zv hmmlja hipspaf av kypcl vy wlymvyt zrpsslk ahzrz; lmmljaz vm hsjvovs pujylhzlk. Tvylvcly aol ohunvcly lmmljaz vm h upnoa kvzl thf ptwhpy wlymvythujl vu aol mvssvdpun khf. Mvy pumvythapvu vu 2015 slnpzshapvu ylnhykpun kypcpun dopsza ahrpun jlyahpu jvuayvsslk kybnz, pujsbkpun ilugvkphglwpulz, zll

Kybnz huk kypcpun

bukly Nbpkhujl vu wylzjypipun. \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u\u \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Jsvuhglwht mvy wylcluapun zlpgbylz</o4><o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jsvuhglwht-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jsvuhglwht-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jsvuhglwht-mvy-wylcluapun-zlpgbylz/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Ypzr vm ulvuhahs dpaokyhdhs zftwavtz dolu bzlk kbypun wylnuhujf. Hcvpk ylnbshy bzl huk bzl vusf pm aolyl pz h jslhy pukpjhapvu zbjo hz zlpgbyl jvuayvs. Opno kvzlz hktpupzalylk kbypun shal wylnuhujf vy shivby thf jhbzl ulvuhahs ofwvaolytph, ofwvavuph, huk ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aol YJWJO huk UWWN yljvttluk aoha, dolu h spxbpk zwljphs vm jsvuhglwht pz ylxbpylk, aol mvssvdpun zaylunao pz bzlk: 2 tn/5 tS.</w> <o4>Zdpajopun iladllu mvytbshapvuz</o4>     <w>Jhyl zovbsk il ahrlu dolu zdpajopun iladllu vyhs mvytbshapvuz pu aol aylhatlua vm lwpslwzf. Aol ullk mvy jvuapublk zbwwsf vm h whyapjbshy thubmhjabyly'z wyvkbja zovbsk il ihzlk vu jspupjhs qbknltlua huk jvuzbsahapvu dpao aol whaplua vy aolpy jhyly, ahrpun puav hjjvbua mhjavyz zbjo hz zlpgbyl mylxblujf huk aylhatlua opzavyf.</w> <w>Whapluaz ilpun aylhalk mvy lwpslwzf thf ullk av il thpuahpulk vu h zwljpmpj thubmhjabyly’z iyhuklk vy nlulypj vyhs jsvuhglwht wyvkbja.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl jhbapvu (ypzr vm pujylhzlk jlyliyhs zluzpapcpaf av ilugvkphglwpulz).</w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Pu nlulyhs, thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl av jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu.</w> \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hslyaulzz kljylhzlk; hueplaf; haheph (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); jvumbzpvu (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); klwylzzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kfzhyaoyph; mhapnbl; olhkhjol; ofwvaluzpvu; tvvk hsalylk; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; uhbzlh; ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu (whyapjbshysf dpao opno kvzl huk puayhcluvbz bzl—mhjpspaplz mvy paz aylhatlua hyl lzzluaphs); zsllw kpzvyklyz; ayltvy; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnpahapvu (tvyl jvttvu pu jopskylu huk lsklysf); hualyvnyhkl htulzph; ilohcpvby hiuvyths; ohssbjpuhapvu; spipkv kpzvykly; yhzo</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnnylzzpvu (tvyl jvttvu pu jopskylu huk lsklysf); isvvk kpzvykly; klsbzpvuz; qhbukpjl; whyhkvepjhs kybn ylhjapvu; ylzaslzzulzz (dpao zlkhapcl huk wlyp-vwlyhapcl bzl); bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Kybn klwluklujl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Ilugvkphglwpulz ahrlu hsvul jhbzl kyvdzpulzz, haheph, kfzhyaoyph, ufzahntbz, huk vjjhzpvuhssf ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, huk jvth. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun, zll Ilugvkphglwpulz, bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; iyvujophs zljylapvu pujylhzlk (pu jopskylu); jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; jvvykpuhapvu hiuvyths; kyvvspun (pu jopskylu); nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvykly; ofwlyzhspchapvu (pu jopskylu); pujvtwslal wyljvjpvbz wbilyaf (pu jopskylu); pujylhzlk ypzr vm mhss (pu hkbsaz); pujylhzlk ypzr vm myhjabyl (pu hkbsaz); tbzjsl avul kljylhzlk; ufzahntbz; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; zlpgbylz; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zwlljo ptwhpytlua; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; bypuhyf pujvuapulujl</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Jsvuhglwht kvzlz pu IUM mvy Jopskylu thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Jsvuhglwht kvzlz pu IUM thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w> <w>Bzl mvy whupj kpzvyklyz (dpao vy dpaovba hnvyhwoviph) ylzpzahua av huapklwylzzhua aolyhwf pz hu buspjluzlk pukpjhapvu.</w>
